session.monitor_desc: Monitor battery, network, screen state, app lifecycle, touch events, and performance metrics
session.auto_feature_note: Selected features will start automatically with the session and stop when the session ends.

session_manager.title: Session Management
session_manager.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected sessions?
session_manager.delete_single_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this session?
session_manager.end_confirm: Are you sure you want to end this session?

assertions.title: Assertions
assertions.no_crashes_desc: Verify no app crashes or ANRs
assertions.name_tooltip: Give the assertion a meaningful name to identify results later
assertions.type_tooltip: Choose how to verify: existence check, non-existence check, or count check
assertions.event_types_tooltip: Select event types to match, multiple selection allowed. Leave empty to match all types
assertions.no_event_types: No event types in current session
assertions.title_match_tooltip: Use regex to match event titles, e.g., .*login.* matches titles containing login

about.title: About Gaze
about.description: A powerful, modern, and self-contained Android management tool built with Wails, React, and Ant Design.
about.vibecoding: This application is a product of pure vibecoding.
about.author: Author
about.made_with: Made with ❤️ for Android Developers & Power Users

app.recording_saved_desc: The screen recording has been saved successfully.
app.screenshot_off: Screen is off or locked, please unlock it before capturing
app.select_option: Select an option from the menu
app.switch_success: Successfully connected via wireless. You can now unplug the cable.
app.switch_failed: Failed to switch to wireless mode
app.feedback_description: Please describe the issue or your suggestion:
app.feedback_placeholder: What happened? How can we reproduce it?
app.feedback_note: A GitHub issue page will be opened with your description and selected logs.

app_info.title: App Information
app_info.fetching_desc: This may take a few seconds as we extract data from the APK
app_info.refreshing_desc: Extracting data from APK, please wait

apps.clear_data_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to clear all data for {{name}}? This cannot be undone.
apps.uninstall_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to uninstall {{name}}?

devices.title: Connected Devices
devices.scan_qr_desc: Scan this QR code with your phone to automatically connect
devices.pairing_guide: Enter the Pairing Code displayed on your phone.
devices.proxy_tip_desc: If using a proxy or VPN on Android, please ensure 'Bypass Local Network' is enabled in your proxy app settings to prevent ADB disconnection.

files.title: Files
files.name: Name
files.delete_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?

logcat.title: Logcat
logcat.select_pre_filters: Select filters to strictly cache only matching logs (Pre-Filter)
logcat.enter_filter_name: Enter a name for this filter rule:
logcat.select_exclude_filters: Select filters to exclude matching logs

mirror.title: Mirror Screen
mirror.turn_screen_off_desc: Turn off device screen while mirroring
mirror.power_off_on_close_desc: Turn off device screen when closing mirror
mirror.camera_version_warning: Camera mirroring requires Android 12 or higher.

proxy.title: Proxy & Network
proxy.mitm_tooltip: Enable HTTPS Decryption (MITM). Requires CA Cert.
proxy.tunnel_info: HTTPS Tunnel (Master Connection). Actual data requests within this tunnel will appear as separate rows if MITM is enabled.
proxy.rules_desc: Add host keywords (e.g. "cdn", "static") that should bypass HTTPS decryption. This is necessary for domains using Certificate Pinning (like Instagram images).
proxy.cert_pushed_desc: CA Certificate has been pushed to: {{path}}
proxy.step_2: Select Install from storage / Install a certificate.
proxy.step_3: Choose CA certificate (tap "Install anyway" if warned).
proxy.step_4: Browse to Downloads and select Gaze-CA.crt.
proxy.cert_warning: * Note: On Android 11+, you might need to install it in "Wi-Fi certificate" and "VPN & app user certificate" separately depending on usage.
proxy.permission_denied_desc: Failed to change settings due to permission restrictions.
proxy.xiaomi_desc: Please enable "USB debugging (Security settings)" in Developer Options.
proxy.xiaomi_note: Note: This usually requires inserting a SIM card and signing in to a Mi Account.
proxy.other_desc: Some devices may block this via ADB. You may need to set the proxy manually in Wi-Fi settings.
proxy.cert_not_trusted: Certificate NOT trusted - HTTPS decryption will fail
proxy.cert_pending: Waiting for HTTPS traffic to verify certificate trust

batch.title: Batch Operation
batch.enter_paths: Please select a file and enter remote path
batch.reboot_warning: This will reboot all selected devices

automation.title: Touch Automation
automation.touch_device_tip: Touch on device screen to record events
automation.scaling_info: Scripts from different resolutions will be auto-scaled. Accuracy may vary.
automation.test_tooltip: Run this recording to verify it
automation.select_element_tip: Select an element from the tree to view details

recording.title: Touch Recording
recording.touch_device_tip: Touch on device screen to record events
recording.fast_mode_desc: Background capture without interruption (recommended for simple flows)
recording.precise_mode_desc: Pause after each action to choose the best locator (recommended for production scripts)
recording.please_choose_selector: Please pick the most stable way to locate this element. This makes your script more robust across devices.
recording.test_tooltip: Run this recording immediately to verify

status.ready: Ready! Please perform action on device

recording.scaling_info: Scripts from different resolutions will be auto-scaled. Accuracy may vary.

workflow.title: Workflow Orchestration
workflow.select_or_create: Select a workflow or create a new one
workflow.name: Workflow Name
workflow.variables_tip: Define initial variables for this workflow. Use {{variable_name}} to reference them in any input field.
workflow.pick_element_tip: Click an element from the tree to select it
workflow.no_valid_selector: Could not generate a valid selector
workflow.bounds_warning: Bounds selectors use fixed screen coordinates. They may not work reliably on different devices or screen orientations.
workflow.pick_point_hint: For WebView/Hybrid pages that cannot be analyzed
workflow.tap_on_device: Tap on the device screen to capture coordinates
workflow.error_no_start: Workflow must have a Start node
workflow.error_duplicate_start: Only one Start node is allowed
workflow.warning_start_not_connected: Start node is not connected to any step
workflow.branch_description: Branch node checks if the specified element exists. Connect True/False outputs to different paths.

smart_search.description: Describe what you want to find in natural language
smart_search.placeholder_general: Search or describe what you're looking for...
smart_search.placeholder_logcat: e.g., "show errors in last 5 minutes" or "crash logs"
smart_search.placeholder_events: Search events or try "network errors after login"
smart_search.no_results: AI could not parse the query

mcp.title: MCP Integration
mcp.subtitle: Model Context Protocol - Connect AI to Android Devices
mcp.description: Gaze provides a built-in MCP server that enables AI assistants (like Claude, Cursor, etc.) to directly control Android devices. Through MCP, AI can perform device management, app operations, UI automation, network capture, and more.
mcp.setup_desc: Add the following configuration to your AI client's MCP settings file:
mcp.setup_claude_code_desc: Run the following command in terminal:
mcp.setup_cursor_desc: Add to .cursor/mcp.json in your project root:
mcp.binary_path_note: Replace the path with the actual location of your Gaze binary. Use --mcp flag to start in MCP mode.
mcp.tools_desc: All tools that AI can invoke through MCP:
mcp.resources_desc: Data resources that AI can read through MCP:

category.device_desc: Connect, disconnect, query device info, execute ADB/aapt/ffmpeg/ffprobe commands
category.apps_desc: List, install, uninstall, start, stop apps, clear data
category.automation_desc: Get UI hierarchy, search elements, tap, swipe, input text
category.session_desc: Create/end sessions, query events, view statistics
category.workflow_desc: Create, run, pause, debug automated workflow sequences
category.proxy_desc: Start/stop HTTP/HTTPS proxy for network interception
category.video_desc: Extract video frames, get metadata, session recording analysis

tool.device_info: Get detailed information about a specific device
tool.device_connect: Connect to a device via ADB over network (IP:port)
tool.device_pair: Pair with a device using wireless debugging
tool.device_wireless: Switch a USB-connected device to wireless ADB mode
tool.device_ip: Get the IP address of a connected device
tool.adb_execute: Execute an arbitrary ADB command on a device
tool.aapt_execute: Execute an aapt command for APK analysis
tool.ffmpeg_execute: Execute an ffmpeg command for video/audio processing
tool.ffprobe_execute: Execute an ffprobe command for media file analysis
tool.app_list: List installed applications on a device
tool.app_info: Get detailed information about an installed app
tool.app_start: Launch an application on the device
tool.app_running: Check if an application is currently running
tool.app_install: Install an APK file on the device
tool.app_clear_data: Clear all data for an application
tool.screen_screenshot: Take a screenshot and return as base64 image
tool.screen_recording_status: Check if device screen is being recorded
tool.ui_hierarchy: Get the current UI hierarchy/layout of the device screen
tool.ui_search: Search for UI elements matching a query
tool.ui_tap: Tap at a specific location or element on the screen
tool.ui_swipe: Perform a swipe gesture on the screen
tool.ui_input: Input text into the focused field (supports Unicode via ADBKeyboard)
tool.keyboard_setup: Install and activate ADBKeyboard for Unicode text input support
tool.session_create: Create a new tracking session with optional configuration
tool.session_active: Get the active session for a device
tool.workflow_get: Get detailed workflow info including all steps
tool.workflow_create: Create a new workflow with steps
tool.workflow_run: Run a workflow on a device
tool.workflow_step_next: Execute next step then pause (step-by-step debugging)
tool.workflow_status: Check if a workflow is currently running
tool.workflow_execute_step: Execute a single workflow step on a device
tool.proxy_start: Start the HTTP/HTTPS proxy for network interception
tool.video_frame: Extract a single frame from a video at a specific time
tool.video_metadata: Get metadata for a video file
tool.session_video_frame: Extract a frame from a session's recording at event time
tool.session_video_info: Get video information for a session

resource.device_info: Detailed information for a specific device

session_summary.title: Session Summary
session_summary.click_to_generate: Click the button to generate summary
